LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Childhood_Generi: Drone "childhoods" are as uninteresting as they are often forgotten. Many creators don't bother marking the moment of awakening, and no drone knows its own history.
LanguageData.ABF_Backstory_Synstruct_Adulthood_Generi: {PAWN_nameDef} is a drone, with no concept of personal history. {PAWN_pronoun} exists to serve.
